page.title: 05Entertainments, Isle of Skye
page.content: There is not much in the way of organised entertainment in this area. We have a community hall,which is very much in need of extensive renovation. The hall is used by the local Youth Club every Saturday during the school term. The parents take turns to supervise. Every three or four months a ceilidh- a social gathering- is held. These are very well attended and enjoyed by all who attend; young and those not so young alike. Occasionally a film is hired to show to the younger members of the community.
